title: Volkswagen says 8 mln cars in EU affected by cheat software - letter
text:
BRIEF-PSI renews network control system for E.ON Deutschland 
Oct 6 PSI : 
* PSI renews network control system for E.ON Deutschland regional supply companies 
* PSI AG Electrical Energy business has received an order from E.ON Deutschland for development and renewal of all network control systems of their regional supply companies Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
